alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; North Bay Interior Valleys; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 10 at 12:35PM PST until March 11 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures of 30 to 35 degrees will result in frost formation. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Valleys, Santa Clara Valley excluding the city of San Jose, Southern Salinas Valley/Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio, Mountains of San Benito County and Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park and Northern Salinas Valley/Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The city of San Jose is excluded from the advisory as temperatures around the urban core will only drop into the upper 30s or lower 40s.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
